bug.author: shoyer
bug.summary: tf.pad docstring is missing description of the "mode" argument
bug.description:
The docstring gives examples of using "CONSTANT", "REFLECT" and "SYMMETRIC" modes, but never describes what they actually are. For example:
What value is used to pad in constant mode? (The answer is 0.) What exactly is the difference between REFLECT and SYMMETRIC? (I don't know.)
